description:
The day of the event to promote the city has arrived. The whole city was holding a festival and Café de Wayne was also helping out with a pop-up shop. Akira asks J and the others to help out with the event and asks them to dress up as butlers, but they decline. Hotaru then suggests that they do a competition in customer service to help bring in more people. J is reluctant, but he finds out he’ll be facing off with Hayakawa and accepts.
Source: crunchyroll
